title: Cozy Updated 3/2 in NE Austin
posting_body: Well-maintained and updated North Austin house available for lease.
It is located in a great neighborhood near a greenbelt and the yard has plenty of room for entertaining, gardening, kids or dogs to play in the backyard.
This house is very close to Parmer Lane and Tech Ridge/Domain shops.
Far enough away from downtown Austin to avoid some of the traffic and congestion
but it's only 8 miles (15 minutes) from Central Austin so you can get there quickly when you want.
Also, there are several parks nearby for dog walks and hiking.
THE YARD:
- Nice fenced-in yard with small concrete patio, sun and shade great for gardening, entertaining, and kids/pets
THE HOUSE:
- 8 miles from Central Austin, 2 miles to Tech Ridge and the Domain
- Attached 2 car garage, one garage door opener
- Built in the 80s
- GREAT neighborhood with friendly and established neighbors!
- 1100 sq ft
- 3 bed/2 bath
- Raised ceiling in living room
- Single-story
- Small concrete covered front porch and uncovered concrete back porch - great for entertaining!
- All bedrooms have nice closets for lots of storage
- Washer/dryer hookups in attached garage
THE INFO:
Contact us by email with any questions.
NOTE: Please include some information about yourself in your email.
Priority will be given to those who include the following information in their response:
What stood out to you from the post?
Who would live in the house?
How do you know one another?
What does each do?
Any pets?
What is your ideal move-in date and do you have flexibility?
Rent: $2150 per month
Refundable deposit: $2150
Lease: Mid-August - June 30, 2023 (or longer, tbd)
Pet deposit: $350 per pet
*All pets must be pre-approved
Application fee: $50 per person
Application process includes a credit history check, rental history check, and criminal background check.
